data.name: Gravity VR
data.description:
THE STORY
Gravity VR drops you in a surreal world where everything perpetually falls. But there's no vertigo or fear, only a unique sensation of floating in zero gravity.

In this captivating VR story, you'll encounter two elderly brothers who lead a surprisingly ordinary and peaceful life amidst the chaos. Until one day...

Experience their emotional journey firsthand and discover what awaits them at the bottom. 

DISCLAIMER:
Gravity VR is not a game. The experience is 15 minutes in duration and focuses on storytelling rather than gameplay.

DIRECTORS:
Gravity VR is the first virtual reality project of Amir Admoni and Fabito Rychter. Their creative partnership has produced a range of acclaimed movies, TV shows, and plays, which have garnered 71 international awards and been featured at over 120 festivals around the world. 

CREATOR´S COMMENT
While falling is often a common nightmare for many people, one of the intriguing aspects of creating Gravity VR was approaching this sensation not as something frightening, but ordinary. 

Gravity´s reach surpassed our wildest dreams. The experience was showcased at Tribeca, Cannes, Venice, among other prestigious festivals. 

Gravity´s success brought us a range of unexpected opportunities that ultimately led to the production of our second VR experience: Lavrynthos.

THEMES:
-Loneliness and isolation
-Polarization, lack of dialogue,  irreconcilable differences
-Mortality and coping with death
